username.name: Your MAL Username
username.description: Must be entered exactly as it appears on MyAnimeList. This is not required, but will speed up page load times by optimising the cover generator for your list.

note.name: Change avatar/sidebar image
note.description: To change the 'avatar' in the sidebar, upload an image to the "Cover image" section on the MAL style page.

sidebar-colour.name: Sidebar Strip Colour
sidebar-colour.description: Change the colour of the strip next to the sidebar.

edit-dialogue.name: Style the Edit Anime dialogue
edit-dialogue.description: Want to make your Edit overlay window look great? Nymphiae has offered CSS for use with a browser extension such as Stylus. See the linked forum thread for info.
